title: Spirituality enlightened people, do they take food supplements like centrum?
description: Answer (1 of 10): I have no idea. A fully-enlightened person thinks NOT of themselves, bur remains here out of compassion, in order to help all others work towards enlightenment. Since they can only do this when IN a body, I suppose they would take actions to maintain their physical health. But ...
